channel.title: haskell on draptik
channel.description: Recent content in haskell on draptik

item.title: F#: Function Signature
item.description: I always forget how to write Haskell-like function signatures in F#. type AddOne = int -> int let addOne : AddOne = fun i -> i + 1 You can think of AddOne as an interface in OO-languages, for functions.
